definitions.body: tame, docile, [[כֶּבֶשׂ אַלּוּף]] a docile (gentle) lamb Je 11:19.

definitions.title: 2. n.m.
definitions.body: friend, intimate Ps 55:14 (‖[[מְיֻדָּע]]) Mic 7:5 (‖[[רֵעַ]]) Pr 16:28, Pr 17:9, Je 13:21; of a woman's husband [[נְעוּרֶיהָ]] ´[[א]] Pr 2:17; fig. of ´[[י]] as husband of Judah, id., Je 3:4.
i. q. I. [[אֶלֶף]]; [[אַלּוּפֵינוּ מְסֻבָּלִים]] Ps 144:14 (i.e. cows).
